name: Swapping Gravity
description:
Made for BlockJam - 1

Controls - A and D to move, spacebar to jump and you can restart the level by pressing R

Credits -

Soundtrack - Out in Space by Agecaf

Jump, landing, and gravity switch sound effects made by jalastram

pressing button sound effect made by Fupi

Everything else in the game was made by me(Pokiruss)

Note: I'm sorry if your game crashes, there is a collision bug of wich I did not have time to fix.
